content: will end up with 36 ch5 spaces rounds 16-21 work as in round 11 round 22 *chain 6 1 single_crochet in next ch5 space and repeat from * round 23 *chain 5 1 single_crochet in the next ch6 space and repeat from * round 24 *chain 4 1 single_crochet in the next ch5 space and repeat from * round 25 *chain 3 1 single_crochet in the next ch4 space and repeat from * round 26 *chain 2 1 single_crochet in the next ch3 space and repeat from * round 27 *chain 2 1sc in the next ch2 space and repeat from * round 28 *1 single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next ch2 space and repeat from * you should have 108 single_crochet round 29 this is your final round and will include making the handles and attaching them to the body of the bag 1 single_crochet into the next 33 single_crochet chain 51 single_crochet into each chain heading back towards the body of your bag single_crochet into the next 21 single_crochet and attach the other side of your handle to the 22 stitch with a two single_crochet 1 single_crochet into the next 33 single_crochet chain 51 single_crochet into each chain heading back towards the body of your bag single_crochet into the next 21 single_crochet and attach the other side of your handle to the beginning of your round with 2 single_crochet slip_stitch in the next single_crochet and fasten_off finishing pull the long tail at the center of your bag tight and weave the tail into the bag bottom weave in any other ends you have www knittedmoondesigns com 3 load up your bag and go shopping care instructions hand or machine wash air dry level of difficulty easy www knittedmoondesigns com 4
